webEncoder

Class WebCodeMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • webEncoder.WebCodeMaker

  • public class WebCodeMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to return Stings or other data types in generating the HTML code output to be interpreted by the web browser This is used for insertables and attributes of tags
    Author:
    nickleus
